data.eml:eml: The Brabantse Delta Water Board manages an area of 171,000 ha, which encompasses the part of the province of Noord-Brabant that lies west of the line Waalwijk/Baarle-Nassau and south of the Hollandsch Diep, the Amer and the Bergsche Maas.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl4,001 records (March 2018)
